tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (DT That) (JJ depressing) (NN moment)) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP realize) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP-TMP (NN today)) (VP (VBZ is) (, ,) (ADVP (IN in) (NN fact)) (, ,) (FRAG (RB not) (NP-TMP (NNP Thursday))))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [realize/VBP dep>[moment/NN det>That/DT amod>depressing/JJ] advmod>when/WRB nsubj>you/PRP ccomp>[is/VBZ mark>that/IN dep>today/NN punct>,/, advmod>[fact/NN case>in/IN] punct>,/, dep>[not/RB dep>Thursday/NNP]] punct>./.]
